text: aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki "allaah ne jo kuchh rozee tumhen dee hai unamen se kharch karo." to jin logon ne inakaar kiya hai, ve un logon se, jo eemaan lae hai, kahate hai, "kya ham usako khaana khilaen jise .di allaah chaahata to svayan khila deta? tum to bas khulee gumaraahee mein pade ho.
